content: materials - 3 6 skeins of purl soho s note 1 80% extra fine merino wool and 20% baby alpaca each skein of this light worsted/dk-weight yarn is approximately 200 yards/ 100 grams approximately 600 1200 total yards required we used the color kiln red - us 7 4 5 mm 47-or 60-inch circular knitting needles 2 - stitch markers 3 or scrap yarn - optional t-pins or blocking pins 4 gauge 20 stitches and 28 row = 4 inches in stockinette stitch sizes scarf wrap finished dimensions 11 inches wide x 69 inches long 18 inches wide x 75¼ inches long note this wrap is worked lengthwise so the width listed above corresponds to the number of row and the length corresponds with the cast-on edge sample we knit the wrap size designed by purl soho designer hiromi glover 5 see even more of hiromi s work on her instagram 6 1 https //www purlsoho com/note html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter-circular_needles html 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter-stitch_markers/type_filter-knitting_%2b_crochet html 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter-blocking_tools/type_filter-knitting_%2b_crochet html 5 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/hiromi-glover-for-purl-soho/ 6 https //www instagram com/mignonnegrise/
